summary: A single mother works tirelessly as a Ginza bar hostess to ensure a better life for her young son until--her long-lost husband returns.
cast: Sumiko Kurishima|Teruko Kojima|Jun Arai|Tatsuo Saitô|Mitsuko Yoshikawa|Reikô Tani|Einosuke Naka|Chôko Iida|Tsuruko Kumoi|Teruko Wakamizu|Kenji Ôyama|Shigeru Ogura|Ichirô Okuni|Seikô Nakamura|Ranko Sawa|Takeshi Sakamoto
title: Yogoto no yume
